q1.question: How long does setup take?
q1.answer: 5-7 business days from kickoff to live. We handle everything.

q2.question: What if I need more conversations?
q2.answer: We offer overage pricing at $0.50 per additional conversation, or you can upgrade your plan.

q3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q3.answer: Yes, there are no long-term contracts. Cancel anytime with 30 days notice.

q4.question: Do you work with our CRM?
q4.answer: Yes, we integrate with most popular CRMs including HubSpot, Salesforce, Pipedrive, and more.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: We've seen agencies lose thousands of dollars because they couldn't respond fast enough. Great services, talented teams—but leads slipping through the cracks because everyone was too busy.
story.p2: That's why we built LeadFlow AI. Not another tool to learn. Not another dashboard to check. A done-for-you service that works 24/7, so you never miss another opportunity.
